_header: Homo proponit / Oft times in vain
_description: ‘Homo proponit, deus disponit’ — a short cross-rhymed quatrain

CamTCC601.Transcription:
Homo proponitOftymes in veynBut deus
                    disponitThe boke telleth pleyn
